shift.name: Palette shift
shift.description: If the colors of some tags don't fit, you can shift the palette.

custom.name: Custom palette
custom.description: The format is XXXXXX-XXXXXX-XXXXXX for each RGB color.

community.heading: Community palettes
community.description: Below are palettes collected from the GitHub discussion. Click any card to apply it instantly or {{communityLinkStart}}share your own{{communityLinkEnd}}.
community.error: Unable to load palettes right now. Feel free to open the discussion to browse them manually.
community.empty: No shared palettes yet. Be the first to post one!

highTextContrast.name: High text contrast
highTextContrast.description: Use only white and black colors for texts

experimental.heading: üß™ Experimental
experimental.description: Dangerous actions or insanely unstable options that could be changed or removed in any time

mixColors.name: Mix colors
mixColors.description: It helps to make text readable

tagColors.name: Tag assignments
tagColors.description: Choose a color from the current palette. If you change the palette, the tag adapts to the nearest color.

reset.name: Reset config
reset.description: üö® All colors of all tags will be recalculated as if it was the first launch of the plugin. Requires restart of Obsidian.

notices.resetDone:
‚úÖ Reset is done
Please restart Obsidian
